1:
Praise Yahweh!\q1 Praise God in his temple!
\q2 Praise him who is in his fortress in heaven!
\q1
2:
Praise him for the mighty deeds that he has performed;\q2 praise him because he is very great!


\q1
3:
Praise him by blowing trumpets loudly;\q2 praise him by playing harps and small stringed instruments!
\q1
4:
Praise him by beating drums and by dancing.\q2 Praise him by playing stringed instruments and by playing flutes!
\q1
5:
Praise him by clashing cymbals;\q2 praise him by clashing very loud cymbals!



\q1
6: I want all living creatures to praise Yahweh!\q1 Praise Yahweh!
